column5: Neat and spotlessly clean, with fresh linens and towels, super comfy beds & pillows!   Private room in calm house, with it's own an ensuite half-bath. Shower is in main bathroom.   Walk to restaurants & bars, train and bus stations, close to UT and centrally located!   We're close to The University of Texas, Bennu Coffee, Austin Daily Press, the School House Pub, Butterfly Bar, Patrizzi's, Dai Due, the Vortex Theatre, Thunderbird Coffee, Salty Sow, El Chilito, etc.
column8: Central Spot! Two beds! East Austin
